directions: Combine chicken broth, coconut milk, corn, soy sauce, chile oil, paprika, sriracha hot sauce, honey, garlic, chicken bouillon, red pepper flakes, cracked black pepper, and seasoned salt in a pot; bring to a boil. Add noodles and cook until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes. Add shrimp and cook until cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes. Serve in a big ramen bowl.
ingredients: 2 ears corn, kernels cut for the cob
3 ounces fresh udon noodles, or more to taste
title: T's Smoky Noodle Bowl
